name: Role of Asset Reconstruction Company or Assignee

queries.text: Is the charge satisfied in favour of an asset reconstructioncompany or assignee/transferee/novatee? If yes, provide the particularsof the asset reconstruction company or assignee. The answer to the abovequery is expressly set out in the Form CHG-4. If the answer is 'No' andthe attachments to the Form CHG-4 contain any references to an assetreconstruction company or assignee/transferee/novatee, please mentionthe same
queries.displayQuery: Role of Asset Reconstruction Company or Assignee
